name: To the Center (ss0201)
description:
This game was created for Trijam #68.9: The 3 hour game jam. (Theme: Opposite Ends)

How To Play

Two circles move from the opposite ends to the center. Try swapping the color of the circles so that their color match the color of the road. You lose if the colors don't match.

Controls

Space: Swap the color of the circles

Used Assets

Free Loops (Music)
くらげ工匠 (SE)
